com.androidanimator.demo

Class AnimationDetailFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.androidanimator.demo.AnimationDetailFragment

  • public class AnimationDetailFragment
extends Fragment
    This is a fragment representing a single Animation detail screen which shows off all the possible animations available in the AndroidAnimator library. This fragment is either contained in AnimationListActivity in two-pane mode (on tablets) or AnimationDetailActivity (on phones).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ARG_ITEM_ID
      The fragment argument representing the item ID that this fragment represents.
